name: Abyssal Nail Ornament
description: Upon attack, deals DEF ignoring P.DMG of 4% ATK to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 10 sec.
Upon attack, deals DEF ignoring P.DMG of 4.8% ATK to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 10 sec.
Upon attack, deals DEF ignoring P.DMG of 5.8% ATK to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 10 sec.
Upon attack, deals DEF ignoring P.DMG of 7% ATK to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 10 sec.
Upon attack, deals DEF ignoring P.DMG of 10% ATK to the enemy every 0.5 sec for 10 sec. This effect will be activated once in 10 sec.
story: Nail ornament of the Abyssal Goddess Xanadus. It is made from an alloy of unknown but special metals.
